HediffDef.label: techwoven
HediffDef.description: Mechanoid technology woven through the body. It gives a variety of strange effects, but also causes vulnerability to EMP weapons.

HediffDef.label: mech signal disruptor
HediffDef.description: A gene grown mechanoid implant. It can disrupt an enemy mechanoid, but also causes vulnerability to EMP weapons.

HediffDef.label: mechlink growth site
HediffDef.description: A gene grown mechanoid implant. It automatically forms a mechlink in the carriers brain, but also causes vulnerability to EMP weapons.

HediffDef.label: cerebrex head
HediffDef.description: A gene grown mechanoid implant. It boost metabolism, but also causes vulnerability to EMP weapons.
